summary: Investigated missing header and session information display in /sessions view
Identified potential edge case with sessions lacking task metadata
Reviewed current handling of session display when task info is absent

quality.preExisting: UI rendering incomplete for sessions without full task context

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Fallback Display for Sessions Without Task Metadata
suggestedTasks.description: Create a robust UI rendering strategy for sessions with partial or missing task information. Develop a default view that provides meaningful information even when complete task details are unavailable. Modify the sessions rendering logic in the frontend to gracefully handle edge cases.
suggestedTasks.reason: Discovered inconsistent UI behavior with incomplete session data

suggestedTasks.title: Add Comprehensive Session Information Validation
suggestedTasks.description: Implement backend validation and frontend handling to ensure sessions always have a minimum set of displayable information. Create a standardized approach for populating session metadata, including default values or placeholders when specific details are missing.
suggestedTasks.reason: Prevent blank or uninformative session displays

gotchas: Potential for silent failures in session display logic

documentationNeeds: Update session rendering behavior in component documentation

summary: Investigated session and task header display issues in Rarestone
Analyzed session metadata rendering for edge cases with empty task info
Ensured proper project detection for idle and active sessions

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Fallback UI for Empty Session Metadata
suggestedTasks.description: Create a robust fallback mechanism for sessions without task information. The current implementation leaves headers blank when no task data exists. Develop a UI component that gracefully handles empty metadata by showing default or placeholder content in /sessions view. This should prevent blank screens and provide meaningful user feedback.
suggestedTasks.reason: Discovered during investigation of header rendering issue

suggestedTasks.title: Add Comprehensive Session Metadata Validation
suggestedTasks.description: Create unit and integration tests to validate session metadata handling across different scenarios. Focus on edge cases like idle sessions, tasks without complete information, and project detection mechanisms. Ensure the testing covers project derivation from signal files, tmux working directory, and session names.
suggestedTasks.reason: Identified gaps in current metadata processing logic

patterns: Derive project from multiple sources (signal files, tmux, session name)
gotchas: Sessions can exist without complete task information
